Key Match Events: Argentina won 2-0 against Peru with goals from Martinez (47', 86') and Paredes (67')
Guerrero (28'), Cartagena (36'), Flores (53'), Zambrano (88'), Cueva (90+4') received yellow cards
Pre-Game Insights: Lionel Messi will miss Argentina's final Group A fixture against Peru due to a sore throat and a tweaked hamstring
Manager Lionel Scaloni confirmed changes will be made to the starting lineup, with Franco Armani and Geronimo Rulli competing for a starting spot in goal
Lucas Martinez Quarta and German Pezzella are yet to feature at this summer's tournament, while Nicolas Otamendi has made just the one substitute outing
Miscellaneous Highlights: Argentina secured a 2-0 win over Peru to top Group A with 9 points from 3 matches
Lautaro Martinez could start his first game of the tournament after scoring two goals in two games as a substitute
